Package com.quality_air.quality_air_backend.services

Class UserService

java.lang.Object
com.quality_air.quality_air_backend.services.UserService
@Service public class UserService extends Object
Service class for managing User entities. This class provides methods to perform operations on User entities, including inserting, updating, retrieving, and logging in users.

      Inserts a new user into the database.

      enter - the User entity to be inserted.
      Returns:
      the saved User entity.

    • update

      public User update(User enter)
      Updates an existing user in the database.
      Parameters:
      enter - the User entity to be updated.
      Returns:
      the updated User entity.

    • getAll

      public List<User> getAll()
      Retrieves a list of all active users.
      Returns:
      a list of users with active status.

    • getId

      public Optional<User> getId(int id)
      Retrieves a user by their ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the user to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the user if found, otherwise empty.

    • login

      public String login(String identifier, String password)
      Validates user login credentials.
      Parameters:
      identifier - the email or nickname of the user.
      password - the password of the user.
      Returns:
      a string indicating whether the credentials are valid or not.
